Package org.apache.fluss.client.table.scanner.batch

Interface BatchScanner

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Closeable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    KvSnapshotBatchScanner, LakeSnapshotAndLogSplitScanner, LakeSnapshotScanner, LimitBatchScanner, SeekableLakeSnapshotSplitScanner
    @PublicEvolving
public interface BatchScanner
extends Closeable
    The scanner that reads records form a table in a batch fashion. Compared to LogScanner, this scanner is designed to read bounded data and will stop when reading end of a bucket, but LogScanner is designed to read unbounded data and continuously read data from buckets.
    Since:
    0.6

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void close()
      Closes the scanner and should release all resources.
      org.apache.fluss.utils.CloseableIterator<org.apache.fluss.row.InternalRow> pollBatch​(Duration timeout)
      Poll one batch records.

    • Method Detail

      • pollBatch

        @Nullable
org.apache.fluss.utils.CloseableIterator<org.apache.fluss.row.InternalRow> pollBatch​(Duration timeout)
                                                                              throws IOException
        Poll one batch records. The method should return null when reaching the end of the input.
        Parameters:
        timeout - The maximum time to block (must not be greater than Long.MAX_VALUE milliseconds)
        Throws:
        IOException
